definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: An estimated fifth of them are in the country illegally.
sentences.chinese: 據估計，這些拉美裔人口中約五分之一都是非法移民。

sentences.english: Homebuilding orders are up by a fifth on a year ago.
sentences.chinese: 房地產開發訂單在一年前更是提升了五分之一。

sentences.english: China typically buys a fifth of the U.S. crop.
sentences.chinese: 中國大約採購美國總產量的五分之一。

sentences.english: Near is a good name. I'll aways be near when someone is sick!
sentences.chinese: 也不一定啊，有可能你就是五分之一的呢。

sentences.english: About one in five adults has arthritis or chronic joint pain.
sentences.chinese: 大約有五分之一的成年人患有關節炎或慢性關節痛。

sentences.english: One in five high school students was a current smoker.
sentences.chinese: 五分之一的大學生當前是吸菸者。

sentences.english: Experts estimate that one out of every five fish sold was caught illegally.
sentences.chinese: 據專家估計，售賣的魚中有五分之一源於非法捕撈。

sentences.english: Only one-fifth of my collection is featured in the book.
sentences.chinese: 這本書中只特寫了我五分之一的收藏。

sentences.english: The new type of equipment will reduce the error probability by a factor of five.
sentences.chinese: 新型設備將使差錯率減少到原來的五分之一。

sentences.english: The most common sign is a micro-facial expression – lasting one-fifth of a second.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的就是僅僅持續五分之一秒的面部微表情。

sentences.english: We require a one-fifth down payment, and you'll pay the balance in six months.
sentences.chinese: 首期我們要收五分之一，其餘的分六個月付清。

sentences.english: One in five had built up debt.
sentences.chinese: 五分之一的人已經築起債務。

sentences.english: About one out of every five companies supported the arts in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 2008年大約有五分之一的企業對藝術提供了資助。

sentences.english: The most common sign is a micro-facial expression – lasting 3 one-fifth of a second.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的就是僅僅持續五分之一秒的面部微表情。

sentences.english: By 2027, one in five Frenchmen will be Muslims.
sentences.chinese: 2027年之前，將有五分之一的法國人是穆斯林。

sentences.english: Date show that one fifth mother nearly mid-age when she have her baby.
sentences.chinese: 數據顯示，五分之一的母親生孩子時都已接近中年。
